unravel.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to understand or explain something that is mysterious or complicated
unravel.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Detectives are still trying to unravel the mystery surrounding his death.
unravel.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if you unravel threads, string etc, or if they unravel, they stop being twisted together
unravel.translation[0].definitions[2].de: if a system, plan, organization etc unravels, it starts to fail
unravel.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: The company started to unravel when two of the directors were arrested.
